title: enabling transparency triggered for multiple objects

content.raw:
In worlds with multiple objects some links are connected in some way when toggling transparency. For example when launching drc_sim_v0 and you enable transparency for the robot it also enables transparency for the standpipe and firehose. Toggling transparency for the golf cart also toggles transparency for standpipe, fire hose, and right upper leg.

Here's a video demonstrating the effect: http://youtu.be/_cxkPfvib3k

This is using the current contact_sensor branch at time of pull request 151 (commit 0bb1e62)
